questions.question: How many primitive vectors does a Bravais lattice of n dimenions have?

explanations.c: A Bravais lattice of n dimensions has n primitive vectors

questions.question: How many primitive vectors does the honeycomb lattice have?

explanations.d: Honeycomb lattice has no primitve vectors

questions.question: If the edge length of a simple cubic lattice is "a" and the radius of atoms is "r", then which of these relations is correct?

explanations.c: An edge of a simple cubic lattice has only 2 atoms. Hence the sum of radius of these two atoms must be equal to the edge length

questions.question: Look up about brick wall lattice. Is it a Bravais lattice?

answers.b: It is not in most cases

explanations.c: The standard brick wall lattice is not a Bravais lattice
